text:
@SecPompeo Trump gets played again, as usual, blundering his way through disaster after disaster, as Americans watch in dismay & defeat.

The American people have come to expect no leadership from Washington.

Mike Pompeo is lying buffoon, an embarrassing failure.

https://t.co/Nw85rW2tQo
